reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Excellent professor! She explains complex topics clearly and is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable but sometimes goes too fast. Great lectures overall.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: The course material is challenging, but Dr. Thompson is approachable and helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about history and makes the class interesting. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Difficult to follow lectures, but the labs are informative. Needs to improve engagement.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Great professor with practical insights into the subject. Exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is amazing! Very understanding and supportive, and the material is engaging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the grading is strict. Be prepared for a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with real-world examples. Participation is key in her class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: One of the best professors in the department! Makes coding concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Good professor, but the workload is heavy. Be prepared to write a lot of essays.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Lectures are dull and repetitive. Could improve student engagement.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Makes art history come alive with vivid explanations.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and passionate about the environment. Assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Challenging material, but Dr. White explains it well. Tutorials are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Great at connecting course material to real-world scenarios. Interesting lectures.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Outstanding professor! Her classes are well-structured, and she provides valuable insights.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Not very engaging and tends to go off-topic. The course could be better organized.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about literature and encourages deep thinking. Assignments are interesting.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Very supportive and knowledgeable. Provides excellent resources and practical examples.
